last_episode_to_air.name: Tell Me Daddy, We Arrived To The Choli
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nicky visits Lawrence after his childhood friend suffers a tragedy. The singer enjoys international success but is nervous to return to Puerto Rico.

name: Nicky Jam: El Ganador
overview: Follow Reggaeton artist Nicky Jam's struggles to overcome drug addiction and rise to international success in this dramatization of his life story.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Follow Reggaeton artist Nicky Jam's struggles to overcome drug addiction and rise to international success in this dramatization of his life story.

episodes.name: The Cangris
episodes.overview: In Puerto Rico in 2000, rising stars Nicky Jam and Daddy Yankee are offered an exciting opportunity just as their friend Tito's actions endanger them.

episodes.name: Escape To New York
episodes.overview: As they try to figure out why Cuti is after them, Los Cangris fly to New York to escape him. Aleysha reveals shocking news. Nicky's drug use escalates.

episodes.name: With The Mic, And The 40 Caliber
episodes.overview: Cuti threatens Nicky's friends and family as Los Cangris prepare for Coyote's concert. Nicky recounts his mother's struggles during his childhood.

episodes.name: In The Bed
episodes.overview: Yankee helps bail Nicky out of trouble. While on tour, Nicky visits Aleysha in Florida, then stops in Massachusetts to seek out his mother.

episodes.name: The Infiltrated
episodes.overview: Nicky heads to prison, where his addiction brings him violent trouble, and a visitor surprises him. Isabel's debts create serious issues for José.

episodes.name: Escante Life
episodes.overview: As a musical rivalry with Daddy Yankee develops, Nicky grows jealous of his success. José moves his family to his brother's home in San Juan.

episodes.name: The Origin
episodes.overview: As Nicky's opioid addiction worsens and impacts his career, his new girlfriend becomes hooked as well. José's criminal past catches up with him.

episodes.name: The Future Is Paisa
episodes.overview: After traveling to Colombia to perform, Nicky regains his confidence and meets a new woman. In 1994, teenage Nicky is discovered at a supermarket.

episodes.name: Medellín
episodes.overview: Nicky moves to Medellín, writes music and pursues a relationship, but keeps partying and doing drugs. An eager manager, Juan Diego, introduces himself.

episodes.name: Cold Turkey
episodes.overview: While helping his son go cold turkey, José realizes how severe Nicky's drug addiction is. Temptation haunts the singer as he returns to work sober.

episodes.name: The Fenix
episodes.overview: Juan Diego uses his savvy business acumen and bluffing tactics to revive Nicky's floundering music career. Meanwhile, the singer worries about his mom.

episodes.name: Isabel
episodes.overview: While on tour, Nicky reconnects with his mom in the Dominican Republic. She joins him in Medellín to get sober and urges him to rethink his love life.

episodes.name: Tell Me Daddy, We Arrived To The Choli
episodes.overview: Nicky visits Lawrence after his childhood friend suffers a tragedy. The singer enjoys international success but is nervous to return to Puerto Rico.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Follow Reggaeton artist Nicky Jam's struggles to overcome drug addiction and rise to international success in this dramatization of his life story.
